articles.author: Maxine Kelly, Yasemin Craggs Mersinoglu, Oliver Ralph, William Langley
articles.title: Live news: UK competition watchdog provisionally finds five banks broke law in gilt market - Financial Times
articles.content:
Oil prices rose sharply on Wednesday, adding to gains after Saudi Arabia, the worlds largest producer, issued a warning to traders speculating on falling prices.
